name: Nutritous Table
description: This website is fully responsive.Actually, this is a recipe-learning website, and all the recipes are full of nutrition. On this website, you can choose the meal depending on nutrition. And also, you can see how many calories you will take after eating that meal.

name: Health Cure Hospital
description: This is a hospital website where users can see doctors details and choose the doctor depending on their problem and can see the services and make their appointments depending on the problem. Login system is included here
